name: Redmund and Blutarch
description:
Redmund and Blutarch is an extremely short adventure game about swinging from platform to platform.

Made in <48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Games Jam. This was originally designed for two players but upon testing, I'm doubtful that there is a pair of people that could be that co-oridinated. So play alone, play with a friend, both works.

The music was made by me a while ago and the SFX were made using BFXR.

The Mac version should work for both Intel and Silicon based Macs. I don't own either however so I can't guarrantee it works on any Mac.

i promise i'm better at unity than photoshop, plz play game
